name: P29
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A service worker in branded uniform carrying a clipboard. They walk steadily toward the front door from the edge of frame. Natural walking gait, arms swinging slightly. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 18-second duration.
